techmeme.title: Handshake CEO Garrett Lord says the startup hit $100M in ARR in eight months after a "refounding" to focus on AI, and forecasts $300M in ARR by end of 2025 (Alex Konrad/Upstarts Media)
Assassin's Creed franchise boss Marc-Alexis Côté departs Ubisoft, two weeks after Ubisoft moved the game under its new Vantage Studios unit; Côté joined in 2005 (Tom Phillips/IGN)
The US DOJ seizes ~$15B in bitcoin from Prince Holding's "pig butchering" operation in Cambodia, in the DOJ's largest ever forfeiture; the founder is at large (Dan Mangan/CNBC)
London-based Dexory, which builds autonomous warehouse robots, raised a $165M Series C, split $100M equity and $65M debt, after raising an $80M Series B in 2024 (Kai Nicol-Schwarz/Sifted)
Sources: Tokyo-based Renesas is exploring a sale, valued at close to $2B, of its timing unit that supplies timing components for data centers and 5G networks (Milana Vinn/Reuters)
